page.title: 10CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Many different games are played in the School playground and field.Sometimes they are current crazes.At present the craze is for girls to bring 'small ponies',plaiting their manes and tails and making nests for them.Frisbies are popular with boys and girls.Various forms of Football and Rugby,Netball, Rounders Tennis and Stootball are played in the Summer.Little children like to play with miniature moulded cars and trucks on the hard surface. Skipping with ropes is popular with both sexes.Also such games as Hide & Seek and many of the Catching variety. Old favourites appear with new titles- Please Jack may I cross the water ? What's the time Mr.Wolf? Fox & Geese and Statues.Daisy chains are still made as a competitive exercise.Conkers , Marbles,and Hopscotch are seasonal. Most popular pastime at home is biking
